'''Compact Air Supply Device''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Compact Air Supply Device is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest after solving a puzzle on [[The Miraculous Antoine Roger Aircraft]] in [[Erinnyes Forest]], [[Fontaine]].
